content: a free version of this pattern is available in my website here 1 this listing if for a printable pdf file which will be available for immediate download after purchase the pdf file consists of a total of 7 pages including cover images copyright and information about the designer there is step by step pictures and detailed instructions to make the crochet coaster set pictured here this is a crochet coaster and coaster holder pattern it was written using standard us terminology approximate size of the finished items coaster 4 5 11 4 cm coaster holder 5 12 7 cm is the diameter measured across the center of the base and 2 5 cm tall yarn i used medium weight #4 100% cotton yarn here are the approximate amounts of yarn you will need coaster 0 51 oz 14 5 g 27 yds 25 m each coaster holder 1 17 oz 33 g 62 yds 57 m materials and tools 4 mm crochet hook scissors tapestry needle stitch marker a 26 66 cm long string or jute rope gauge gauge is not crucial but the circumference for the first 7 rounds is 3 7 6 cm measured across the center more details included in the pdf language english us level of difficulty easy basic skills needed magic_ring chain single_crochet double_crochet fasten_off and weave in ends terms of use | copyright all pictures and the pattern contained in this document are the property of zamiguz handmade creations by magna haskell aka maggie this pattern is for personal use only it is prohibited to copy share resell translate publish alter distribute or reproduce the pattern or parts of it in any form online or offline you may sell your handmade items made from my patterns and i would appreciate if you gave credits to zamiguz handmade creations @zamiguz no mass production allowed 1 https //zamiguz com/easy-and-free-crochet-coaster-pattern-and-holder/
